text: The 2020 season was Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors' 28th season in the K-League in South Korea. Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors is competing K League, Korean FA Cup and AFC Champions League. Jeonbuk is a defending champions of 2019 K-Keague. K League was supposed to kick off on February 29th, however, due to the coronavirus, it is not yet clear when to kick off, on May 6, the Korean Football Association announced on May 8th, match will be played behind the closed doors. ==Current squad== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;
